.github/workflows/deploy.yml: Empty GitHub Actions workflow file for deployment automation.
backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing weaver catalog portal with user profiles, weaver profiles, products (with multi-image support), customers, authorization, blob storage, and seamless upgrade migration.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module defining data types and a pass-through migration function for seamless state persistence across canister upgrades.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting frontend build process for Candid declarations and routing/asset path updates for IC canister deployment.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including components, pages, hooks, and configuration with details on routing, authentication, product management with multi-image support, and styling.
frontend/.env.example: Environment variable template for canister IDs and network configuration populated by dfx during deployment.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS styles with OKLCH color system defining light and dark mode themes using traditional Indian textile color palette.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Weaver Catalog Portal React application with root div and module script reference.
frontend/public/.nojekyll: Empty file to disable Jekyll processing for GitHub Pages deployment.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with all routes, React Query, Internet Identity authentication, and profile setup modal flow.
frontend/src/components/CustomerForm.tsx: Modal form component for adding and editing customer records with name, customer type dropdown, and contact details fields.
frontend/src/components/CustomerTypeDial: A dialog component that allows users to select a customer type (retail, wholesale, or direct) for generating shareable catalog links with type-specific pricing.
frontend/src/components/FeatureSection.t: A landing page section component that displays four feature cards highlighting catalog management, customer portal, smart sharing, and mobile-friendly capabilities.
frontend/src/components/ImageGallery.tsx: An image gallery component with main image display, navigation arrows, thumbnail strip, and image counter for viewing multiple product images.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: A button component that handles Internet Identity authentication, showing login/logout states with loading indicators and managing query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/LogoUpload.tsx: A logo upload component with drag-and-drop support, image preview, upload progress tracking, and remove functionality using ExternalBlob for file handling.
frontend/src/components/MultiImageUpload: A multi-image upload component supporting up to 5 images with drag reordering, removal, upload progress tracking, and validation using ExternalBlob.
frontend/src/components/PageLayout.tsx: A layout wrapper component providing responsive navigation, main content area, and footer with caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: A product card component displaying product details, images, pricing for different customer types, stock management with quantity controls, and actions for edit, delete, and share.
frontend/src/components/ProductForm.tsx: A dialog form component for creating/editing products with fields for name, prices (retail/wholesale/direct), images, description, visibility, quantity, made-to-order flag, and color selection from standard and custom colors.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: A modal component that prompts new users to enter their name to complete profile setup, using the useSaveCallerUserProfile hook to persist the data.
frontend/src/components/ResponsiveNav.ts: A responsive navigation header with mobile hamburger menu and desktop nav links for Profile, Catalog, Customers, and Share Links, conditionally shown when authenticated.
frontend/src/components/ShareLinkCard.ts: A card component that displays a shareable link with title, description, icon, and a copy-to-clipboard button with visual feedback.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance, handling authentication with Internet Identity and initializing access control with an admin token from URL parameters.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context and hooks for login/logout functionality, managing AuthClient creation, identity persistence, and delegation validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend operations including user profiles, weaver profiles, products, and customers with mutations that invalidate relevant queries and show toast notifications.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a traditional Indian textile color palette for both light and dark modes using OKLCH color space.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and renders the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/CatalogManagementPage: Authenticated page for managing product catalog with CRUD operations, quantity updates, and stock status toggles using React Query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/CustomerManagementPag: Authenticated page for managing customer contacts with add, edit, and delete functionality, displaying customer type badges and requiring Internet Identity login.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with hero section, feature section, and CTA promoting the saree catalog platform for Indian weavers, with conditional navigation based on authentication.
frontend/src/pages/PublicCatalogPage.tsx: Public-facing catalog page that displays products filtered by weaver ID and customer type (retail/wholesale/direct) with appropriate pricing, no authentication required.
frontend/src/pages/PublicProductDetailPa: Public product detail page showing full product information with image gallery, customer-type-specific pricing, and weaver branding without requiring authentication.
frontend/src/pages/ShareLinksPage.tsx: Authenticated page that generates and displays shareable catalog links for retail, wholesale, and direct customer types based on the logged-in weaver's principal.
frontend/src/pages/WeaverProfilePage.tsx: React page component for managing weaver business profiles, allowing authenticated users to edit their business name, address, and logo with form validation and submission to backend.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support for maintaining state across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, typography settings with serif/sans fonts, extended spacing/shadows, and animation keyframes for accordion components.
frontend/tsconfig.node.json: TypeScript configuration for Node.js build tools (Vite) with ESNext module resolution and composite project settings.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking deployment status to Internet Computer canisters, listing pending requirements for dfx.json configuration, frontend build process fixes, routing updates, and removal of GitHub Pages deployment artifacts.
